alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 12 at 1:44PM MDT until March 14 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph, are possible. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains, Madison River Valley and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reduced visibility due to blowing snow and partial lane blockages are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
